name: Banana Monkey Run - Crazy Spider Jump Minion Fun Rush
name_original: Banana Monkey Run - Crazy Spider Jump Minion Fun Rush
description:
It’s a jungle out there! The Monkey is eager to gather bananas but must avoid scary spiders. Can you help him do it? Don’t forget to jump over those logs! This is silly fun!

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
Great Time-Killer Game!
Tons of fun!

Download ‘Banana Monkey Run’ Now!!!
